verses.roman:
ṣoḍaśe--kālidāse prabhu kṛpā karilā
vaiṣṇavocchiṣṭa khāibāra phala dekhāilā

synonyms: ṣoḍaśe—in the Sixteenth Chapter; kāli-dāse—unto Kālidāsa; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpā karilā—showed favor; vaiṣṇava-ucchiṣṭa khāibāra—of eating the remnants of food left by Vaiṣṇavas; phala dekhāilā—showed the result.
translation: The Sixteenth Chapter tells how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu showed His mercy to Kālidāsa and thus demonstrated the result of eating the remnants of the food of Vaiṣṇavas.
